title: Christmas videos volume 2 (S)
brief_description: This tape features 7 cartoons united by the theme of Christmas. They include: “Snow foolin’”; the first day of winter is celebrated in fine style by the animals; “Toys will be toys”; the toys from Santa’s workshop come to life when the toyshop closes: “A Christmas visit”; a young boy holidays to the South Pole to visit his father: “Have you got any castles?”; a zany cartoon review of recogniseable books, films and film stars: “Gold rush daze”; a tale of gold mining set in California over 100 years ago: “The Wild swans”; children are turned into swans by the King’s evil new wife, all except one child: “Hasty and the Princess”; a country boy requires some animal assistance when he is set a challenging task by the King.
